Package de.db.derpate.util

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    EncryptionUtil
    This interface should be used for all encryption utils, so that they can be replaced easily.
    HashUtil
    This interface provides methods that are normally used with hash algorithms.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AES256EncryptionUtil
    This util uses a 256 bit AES algorithm with Galois Counter Mode (GCM) provided by the SpringFramework.
    AES256EncryptionUtilTest  
    CSRFPreventionUtil
    This util should be used to prevent cross-site request forgery.
    CSRFPreventionUtilTest  
    DateUtil
    This util is used to simplify Date operations
    DateUtilTest  
    DefaultHttpSession  
    HibernateUtil
    This util contains tools for the data access objects
    InputVerifyUtil
    This util can be used to verify inputs, especially when the data is given by the frontend.
    InputVerifyUtilTest  
    NumberUtil
    Util providing methods, that are useful when working with integers.
    NumberUtilTest  
    PropertyUtil
    This util offers methods to read out of an ".properties" file stored in the /resource folder.
    Files have to conform Java's Properties format.
    RandomUtil
    This util may be used to generate random data
    RandomUtilTest  
    ServletUtil
    This util offers methods, that can be used for HttpServlets.
    SHA256Util
    This util uses the SHA-265 algorithm to hash data.
    It implements the methods of HashUtil.
    SHA256UtilTest  
    StringEscapeUtil
    This util escapes and unescapes Strings for HTML and JSON.
    It uses the StringEscapeUtils.
    StringEscapeUtilTest  
    URIParameterEncryptionUtil
    This util encrypts URI parameters to prevent the user from guessing the values.
    URIParamterEncryptionUtilTest
